title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I work full time Mon-Fri with no option of overtime and lately have realized I have a lot of spare time on my hands and want to do something a few evenings during the week to bring in extra money, any ideas?

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Have you not got a hobby you do in your spare time that you could monetise? Anything from programming to painting there's probably a market for it - both locally and online.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Find a sales job that is commission only that you can work on your own time. Then learn the industry really well and practice, practice, practice making calls and closing deals. There are plenty of sales training videos on YouTube that you can which many are industry-specific so all you have to do is put in the effort to learn.There are many profitable industries that are always in need of sales agents. Insurance, Loans, Mortgages, Real Estate, Investing, etc.Make sure the commission is at least $500 to make it worth your time. If you can close 1 deal per week putting in 1-2 hours a day, then that is $2000 per month extra income.
